hero.title: Transforming Rural Odisha
hero.subtitle: 100,000+ Lives Touched | 500+ Villages
hero.description: National Humanity & Rural Development (NHRD)Transforming rural Odisha since 2000 by empowering marginalized communities through education, women and child development, healthcare, sustainable livelihoods, and climate-resilient initiatives.

impact.title: Our Impact in Numbers
impact.subtitle: 25 years of dedication to rural development

programs.title: How We Transform Lives
programs.subtitle: Integrated programs addressing education, health, livelihoods, and more

education.title: Education
education.description: Notably, NHRD established London School of Education (LSE), an English medium school in 2008, providing free education, transportation, uniforms, learning materials, and health check-ups.

women.title: Women Empowerment
women.description: 4,481 Self-Help Groups formed, ₹80 million microfinance linked, empowering women through capacity building and training.

health.title: Health & Sanitation
health.description: 472 villages certified ODF (Open Defecation Free), clean water access, hygiene promotion, and health awareness programs.

livelihood.title: Livelihood Support
livelihood.description: Dairy, fish farming, masonry training (1,660 trained), and skills development for sustainable income generation.

agriculture.title: Agricultural Support
agriculture.description: 500+ farmer groups supported with improved farming techniques, organic practices, and crop support.

disaster.title: Disaster Response
disaster.description: Emergency response including Cyclone Fani relief (4,500 families) and COVID-19 support for affected communities.

microfinance.title: Microfinance
microfinance.description: Providing financial assistance and credit linkage to SHGs to promote entrepreneurship and sustainable livelihoods.

stories.title: Stories of Transformation
stories.subtitle: Real people, real change, real impact

trust.title: 25 Years of Trust
trust.description: Registered under the Societies Registration Act 1860, NHRD operates on the principles of love, sacrifice, dedication, transparency, and commitment.

impact.title: Measurable Impact
impact.description: Every rupee creates real change - education, health, livelihoods for rural communities.

transparency.title: Complete Transparency
transparency.description: Annual reports, impact metrics, and regular updates on how your support makes a difference.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated with Our Work
newsletter.description: Get monthly updates on our impact, stories from the field, and ways to get involved.
newsletter.privacy: We respect your privacy. No spam, ever.

footer.aboutText: National Humanity And Rural Development  (NHRD) focus areas of activities are Education, Empowerment of Women & Children Development &Livelihood
footer.copyright: © 2024 National Humanity & Rural Development. All rights reserved.

about.heroSubtitle: 25 Years of Transforming Lives Through Community Participation
about.visionText: Creating an equitable society where underprivileged and marginalized communities live with dignity, enjoying their rights and privileges, and ensuring a better quality of life.
about.missionText: Translating visionary thoughts into reality through community participation and involvement of programme participants in every project activity.
about.journeySubtitle: 25 years of dedication to rural development
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide our work

inclusion.title: Inclusion
inclusion.description: Ensuring all community members have equal access to programs and opportunities.

equity.title: Social Equity
equity.description: Working towards fair distribution of resources and opportunities.

gender.title: Gender Equity
gender.description: Promoting equal participation and benefits for all genders.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Building programs that create lasting, self-sustaining change.

accountability.title: Accountability
accountability.description: Transparent operations and responsible use of resources.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: Enabling communities to drive their own development.

2000.title: NHRD Founded
2000.description: Under the leadership of Sri Bhagirathi Pradhan, a celebrated social activist, a group of young individuals came together to form NHRD.

2008.title: London School of Education
2008.description: Free school model launched, providing quality education to underprivileged children.

2015.title: SHG Movement
2015.description: Crossed 3,000 Self-Help Groups, empowering thousands of women.

2019.title: Cyclone Fani Response
2019.description: Emergency relief to 4,500+ families affected by the devastating cyclone.

2024.title: 100,000+ Lives Impacted
2024.description: Reached a milestone of transforming over 100,000 lives across 500+ villages.

donate.heroSubtitle: Every donation creates lasting change in rural communities. Your support matters.
donate.taxBenefit2: 12A registration: Organization exempt from income tax
donate.trustMessage: Every rupee you donate goes directly to transforming lives. With 25 years of trust and complete transparency, we ensure your generosity creates maximum impact.

contact.heroSubtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out with questions, feedback, or partnership inquiries.
contact.name: Name
contact.thankYou: Thank you for reaching out. We'll respond within 24 hours.

faqs.a1: Your donation directly funds our programs in education, health, women empowerment, and more. We maintain complete transparency with detailed annual reports.
faqs.a2: Yes! We have opportunities for remote volunteers in areas like content creation, social media, and fundraising support.
faqs.q3: How do I get a donation receipt?
faqs.a3: Donation receipts are automatically sent to your email. You can also request 80G certificates for tax exemption.
faqs.a4: Yes, NHRD is registered under the Societies Registration Act and holds 80G, 12A, FCRA, and NITI Aayog certifications.

getInvolved.heroSubtitle: Find your role in this movement for rural transformation

volunteer.title: Become a Volunteer
volunteer.description: Join our 11,600+ volunteers making direct impact in villages across Odisha.

donation.title: Support with a Donation
donation.description: One-time or monthly support for programs that matter to you.

csr.title: CSR Contribution
csr.description: Align your company's CSR goals with community development.

careers.title: Work With Us
careers.description: Careers in rural development, education, health, and more.

getInvolved.whyVolunteerSubtitle: Join 11,600+ volunteers who have found purpose in community service

certificates.title: Certificates
certificates.description: Earn recognized certificates for your service

flexible.title: Flexible Hours
flexible.description: Choose your own schedule and commitment level

impact.title: Direct Impact
impact.description: See the change you create in real communities
